title: 3.17.3.0万圣节更新
author: 诺羽
txt_content:
本帖最后由 诺羽 于 2016-10-29 01:30 编辑 

原文链接:http://store.steampowered.com/news/?appids=304930
stockpile地址:http://store.steampowered.com/itemstore/304930/browse/?filter=New

Halloween:

In celebration of Halloween until the next update you will now get dropped Halloween Gift Presents filled with free costumes, and can visit the Liberator to find the crew all dressed up! The biggest wave yet of mostly spooky curated workshop items was also accepted and now available on the Stockpile if you'd like to take a look: 
为了庆祝万圣节，到下次更新为止，你可以在游戏里获得万圣节礼物(大量免费的服装)，你可以看到航母解放者的船员们全部穿着万圣节装饰了。最厉害的是你可以在作者的Stockpile页面看创意工坊里的策划栏目(curated)里被采用的万圣节主题物品的预览图了
View Stockpile 

The most exciting bit for last however: there's a new secret achievement to solve, much more complex than the first! In my opinion it's a lot fairer (no localchat puzzle), so no hints this time! 最令人兴奋的一点是：有一个新的秘密成就，比第一个复杂得多！ 在我看来，这是一个更公平的（没有本地聊天解谜），所以暂时没有提示！

Update Notes:
更新日志

Additions: 
Added Mk. II achievement/puzzle/easter egg. 
增加了 Mk. II 成就/谜题/复活节彩蛋
Added new items to Halloween Gift Present. 
添加了新的物品到万圣节礼物
Accepted a ton of new curated workshop items.
接受了成吨的创意工坊策划物品

Improvements: 
Decorated the Liberator for Halloween.
解放者号上添加了万圣节装饰
Tweaks: 
Tweaked galley to sell snack food items.
调整了船上卖的快餐食品
Fixes: 
Fixed bug preventing binding keys to mouse buttons 4-7. 
修复了鼠标绑定4-7按键
Fixed chamber door decal material. 
修复了室门的材质
Fixed missing space in scout dialogue. 
修复了童军对话中的缺失空间。
Fixed using bayonet while sprinting. 
修复了冲刺时使用刺刀
Fixed some issues with fog in deferred mode. 
修复了延迟模式中雾的一些问题
Fixed satellite terrain capture in deferred mode. 
修复了延迟模式下卫星捕获的的地形
Fixed decals swapping modes when reloading area. 
修复了重载区域的贴图衔接模式
Fixed terrain reflection to only use basemap. 
修复了地形反射到只用底图
Fixed radiation splat decal deferred emission.
修复了辐射贴图推迟通知

replies.author: asd1758934779
replies.txt_content: 问一下，无名人把翻译新闻这个艰巨的任务交给若羽了吗，还是一起弄

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
应该这样翻译：Fixes: 
Fixed bug preventing binding keys to mouse buttons 4-7. 
修复绑定鼠标按键4-7时的bug
Fixed chamber door decal material. 
修复了宿舍门的材质
Fixed missing space in scout dialogue. 
修复了scout对话文件中的缺失的空格。
Fixed using bayonet while sprinting. 
修复了冲刺时使用刺刀的问题
Fixed some issues with fog in deferred mode. 
修复了Deferred渲染模式中雾的一些问题
Fixed satellite terrain capture in deferred mode. 
修复了Deferred渲染模式下卫星捕获的地形
Fixed decals swapping modes when reloading area. 
修复了重载区域时的贴图衔接模式
Fixed terrain reflection to only use basemap. 
修复了地形反射渲染只使用基础图的问题
Fixed radiation splat decal deferred emission.
修复了辐射区溅泼贴图延迟发射的问题
